64530.summary: Some customers in the Bowness area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
64530.title: July 24 - Calgary (Bowness) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

64532.summary: Some customers in the Beltline, and the Downtown areas of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
64532.title: July 24 - Calgary (Beltline, Downtown) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
